always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    active <= 1'b0;
  end else if (req_valid == 1'b1) begin
    active <= 1'b1;
  end else if (fifo_eot_beat == 1'b1) begin
    active <= 1'b0;
  end
end
